sep.gaia.resources.markeroption

Class MarkerResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.resources.DataResource
      • sep.gaia.resources.poi.PointOfInterest
        • sep.gaia.resources.markeroption.MarkerResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MarkerResource
extends PointOfInterest
    This class is to implement a marker of a point of interest which stores the current zoom level which the map adopts and the geographical coordinates of the point. It inherits from PointOfInterest. In addition each marker gets an individual name. As soon as the marker is chosen, the map switches to the place (that means the geographical position) and the zoom level the marker has been stored at.
    Author:
    Fabian Buske
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
